Package ModuleTransaction.Orgcom

Interface Transaction

All Superinterfaces:
Hashable, java.lang.Iterable<TransactionLine>
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicTransaction
public interface Transaction
extends Hashable, java.lang.Iterable<TransactionLine>
The Transaction interface provides the methods for a transaction.

  • Method Summary

    boolean addTransactionLine​(TransactionLine transactionLine)

    java.time.LocalDate getDateCreated()
    Returns the date of creation of the transaction.

    Returns a hash code value for the class.

    Returns the receiver of the transaction.

    Returns the sender of the transaction.

    Returns the total value of the transaction.

    Return the number of transaction lines in the transaction.

    Return the transaction line in the transaction that have the same hash.

    Prints the transaction to the console.

  • Method Details

    • getTransactionLine

      TransactionLine getTransactionLine​(TransactionLine transactionLine)
      Return the transaction line in the transaction that have the same hash.
      Parameters:
      transactionLine - the transaction line to be checked.
      Returns:
      the transaction line in the transaction that have the same hash, null if not found.
      Throws:
      UnHashableException - if the transactionLine are not hashable.

    • getDateCreated

      java.time.LocalDate getDateCreated()
      Returns the date of creation of the transaction.
      Returns:
      the date of creation of the transaction.

    • getSender

      Entity getSender()
      Returns the sender of the transaction.
      Returns:
      the sender of the transaction.

    • getReceiver

      Entity getReceiver()
      Returns the receiver of the transaction.
      Returns:
      the receiver of the transaction.

    • getTotalValue

      double getTotalValue()
      Returns the total value of the transaction.
      Returns:
      the total value of the transaction.

    • getTransactionCounter

      int getTransactionCounter()
      Return the number of transaction lines in the transaction.
      Returns:
      the number of transaction lines in the transaction.

    • addTransactionLine

      boolean addTransactionLine​(TransactionLine transactionLine)
      Adds a transaction line to the transaction. When the transaction line is added to the transaction, the total value and the transaction counter are updated.
      Parameters:
      transactionLine - the transaction line to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction line was added, false if the transaction line was already added.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction line is null.

    • removeTransactionLine

      boolean removeTransactionLine​(TransactionLine transactionLine)
      Removes a transaction line from the transactions. The transaction line is removed from the transaction, the total value and the transaction counter are updated.
      Parameters:
      transactionLine - the transaction line to be removed.
      Returns:
      true if the transaction line was removed, false if the transaction line was not found.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the transaction line is null.

    • print

      void print()
      Prints the transaction to the console.

    • getHash

      java.lang.String getHash()
      Description copied from interface: Hashable
      Returns a hash code value for the class.
      Specified by:
      getHash in interface Hashable
      Returns:
      hash code value for the class.
